casebody.data:
R.J. REYNOLDS TOBACCO COMPANY, petitioner,
v.
Peter MACK, Jr., as Personal Representative of the Estate of Peter Mack, Sr. No. 13-1186. Supreme Court of the United States June 9, 2014.

Case below, 134 So.3d 956.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the District Court of Appeal of Florida, First District, denied.
